pinyin: ji3 he2 ji2 shu4 zeng1 zhang3

sentences.english: There is no doubt that travelling broadens one’s mind and enlarge/improve/increase one’s knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，旅行使人開闊眼界，增長知識。

sentences.english: China's fertility rate may be much lower than official estimates.
sentences.chinese: 中國人口高增長率可能會比政府估計的要低很多。

sentences.english: The biggest accumulating rate occurred around the heading period with a one-peak curve.
sentences.chinese: 增長速率最快時期在抽穗前後，呈單峯型曲線。

sentences.english: Multi-cropping optimized and cropping density increased in wave.
sentences.chinese: 作物複種方式不斷優化，複種指數呈波動式增長。

sentences.english: Emerging Asia has grown by an annual average of 8% over the past three years—as fast as before the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 過去三年來以年均8%的速度增長着，和危機前一樣。

sentences.english: Population can increase in a geometric ratio .
sentences.chinese: 人口可以按幾何級數增長。

sentences.english: The company portrays itself as the fastest growing online car-rental agency on earth.
sentences.chinese: 該公司是目前增長速度最快的在線租車代理商。

sentences.english: This assessment also influenced ELS' approach to growth going forward.
sentences.chinese: 這項評估同時也影響了ELS的向前增長的方式。

sentences.english: Other factors will affect near-term employment growth as well.
sentences.chinese: 其他因素也會對近期的就業增長產生影響。

sentences.english: Anti-immigration sentiments are stronger in an economic crisis.
sentences.chinese: 在經濟危機中，反移民的情緒會增長。

sentences.english: It was low growing, with a bow just high enough to catch her.
sentences.chinese: 它是低增長，只是高要抓住她的弓。

sentences.english: So what are Chinese number- crunchers up to?
sentences.chinese: 所以，什麼纔是中國經濟增長的數字？

sentences.english: The Around Bohai Region is the third pole of economic jack-up in China.
sentences.chinese: 環渤海地區是我國經濟增長的第三極。

sentences.english: Thekeydriver behind the increase will come from basic set-top boxes.
sentences.chinese: 增長背後的主要驅動力來自於基礎機頂盒市場。

sentences.english: Policymakers may be starting to worry that asset prices are running up too quickly.
sentences.chinese: 決策層可能已經開始擔心資產價格的過快增長。

sentences.english: The rate of inflations has increased by 2%.

definition: to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
